name: BLOCK COLOR: New Brick Game
description:
BLOCK COLOR: New Brick Game is classical game and very interesting with very nice graphics design.
It’ll take you back to the childhood Simple but addictive puzzle game!
How to play
1. Simply drag the blocks to move them.
2. Try to create full lines on the grid vertically or horizontally.
3. Blocks can't be rotated.
4. No time limits.
